channel.title: Battlescape Commands
channel.description: Does anyone know if you can use commands in battlescape? If you can, could you explain how to?

item.title: Battlescape Commands
item.dc:creator: @blood_beast blood beast
item.description:
@blood_beast wrote:

cool, add some player rights to your code and it will work
Can I change the player rights if I’m using an rsps that I didn’t code myself? Im using the battlescape webclient from http://www.palidino.com/client.php I do have the source code but: 1. I don’t know how I would change the player rights 2. I still have no Idea how to compile these things on my mac 3. I don’t know how to publish a webclient to the web

item.title: Battlescape Commands
item.dc:creator: @vamp256 vamp256
item.description:
@vamp256 wrote:

::barrows
::gfx [gfxidhere]
::cannon
::gopk
::cw
::startmine1
::startmine2
::hightrain
::minerune
::crystal chest.

Basically, its whats in side the " " tags,
iie
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“karamja”))

its ::karamja
get it?

item.title: Battlescape Commands
item.dc:creator: @blood_beast blood beast
item.description:
@blood_beast wrote:

Well I found this in the client.java file and tried some but only ::players worked. Could someone show me how to use these?

[code] public void customCommand(String command) {
actionAmount++;
if (command.startsWith(“barrows”))
{
addItem(4716, 1);
addItem(4718, 1);
addItem(4720, 1);
addItem(4722, 1);
addItem(4708, 1);
addItem(4710, 1);
addItem(4712, 1);
addItem(4714, 1);
addItem(4753, 1);
addItem(4755, 1);
addItem(4757, 1);
addItem(4759, 1);
addItem(4745, 1);
addItem(4747, 1);
addItem(4749, 1);
addItem(4751, 1);
addItem(4732, 1);
addItem(4734, 1);
addItem(4736, 1);
addItem(4738, 1);
addItem(4726, 1);
addItem(4728, 1);
addItem(4730, 1);
addItem(4724, 1);
}
else if (command.startsWith(“gfx”))
{
int id = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5));
animation(id, absX, absY);
}
if (command.startsWith(“cannon”))
{
addItem(6082, 1);
}

if (command.startsWith("gopk")) {
				teleportToX = 3244;
				teleportToY = 3517;
					}
			if (command.startsWith("cw")) {
				teleportToX = 2440;
				teleportToY = 3089;
					}
			if (command.startsWith("kbd")) {
				teleportToX = 3341;
				teleportToY = 3210;
					}
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("startmine1"))
{
	teleportToX = 3285;
	teleportToY = 3366;
	sendMessage("For beginning miners.");
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("startmine2"))
{
	teleportToX = 2628;
	teleportToY = 3144;
	sendMessage("For beginning miners.");
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("hightrain"))
{
	teleportToX = 2620;
	teleportToY = 3376;
	sendMessage("For experienced fighters.");
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("minerune"))
{
	teleportToX = 3060;
	teleportToY = 3885;
	sendMessage("RUNE!");
} 
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("crystalchest"))
{
	teleportToX = 2914;
	teleportToY = 3450;
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("wildmine"))
{
	teleportToX = 3081;
	teleportToY = 3762;
	sendMessage("Lots of rocks!");
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("karamja"))
{
	teleportToX = 2905;
	teleportToY = 3180;
} 
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("draynor"))
{
	teleportToX = 3093;
	teleportToY = 3249;
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("edgeville"))
{
	teleportToX = 3087;
	teleportToY = 3495;
}
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("kalphqueen"))
{
	teleportToX = 3487;
	teleportToY = 9493;
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("kingbd"))
{
	teleportToX = 2717;
	teleportToY = 9816;
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("abbydemons"))
{
	teleportToX = 3011;
	teleportToY = 3848;
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("chaoselem"))
{
	teleportToX = 3243;
	teleportToY = 3921;
}

if (command.startsWith(“magearena”)) {
teleportToX = 3112;
teleportToY = 3943;
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“wildtrain”))
{
teleportToX = 3243;
teleportToY = 3522;
sendMessage(“Begin your combat here”);
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“bowsandbones”))
{
teleportToX = 3231;
teleportToY = 3423;
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“plateandleg”))
{
teleportToX = 3229;
teleportToY = 3436;
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“shopworld”))
{
teleportToX = 3345;
teleportToY = 3212;
}
else if (command.startsWith(“essence”))
{
teleportToX = 2910;
teleportToY = 4832;
}

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“robes”))
{
teleportToX = 3206;
teleportToY = 3417;
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“weapons”))
{
teleportToX = 3207;
teleportToY = 3398;
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“helmets”))
{
teleportToX = 3076;
teleportToY = 3429;
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“shields”))
{
teleportToX = 2976;
teleportToY = 3383;
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“party”))
{
teleportToX = 2737;
teleportToY = 3472;
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“cw”))
{
teleportToX = 2440;
teleportToY = 3089;
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“tzhaar”))
{
teleportToX = 2480;
teleportToY = 5171;
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“dtrain”))
{
teleportToX = 3345;
teleportToY = 3251;
sendMessage(“Welcome to Dagannoth Arena”);
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“slayerdungeon”))
{
teleportToX = 2832;
teleportToY = 9657;
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“firepit”))
{
teleportToX = 3292;
teleportToY = 9829;
sendMessage(“Currently only fire monsters down here.”);
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“bigcave”))
{
teleportToX = 2709;
teleportToY = 9470;
sendMessage(“If your attacking dragons make sure your weilding”);
sendMessage(“and anti-dragonfire shield that Cassie sells.”);
sendMessage(“The other guy here has some sharks.”);
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“waterbirth”))
{
teleportToX = 2501;
teleportToY = 3730;
sendMessage(“A mystic force takes you to a flight…”);
sendMessage(“You found yourself on the Waterbirth Island.”);
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“smelt”))
{
teleportToX = 2974;
teleportToY = 3370;
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“fish”))
{
teleportToX = 3240;
teleportToY = 3435;
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“agility1”))
{
teleportToX = 3540;
teleportToY = 9890;
sendMessage(“You enter the agility course!”);
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“agility2”))
{
teleportToX = 3002;
teleportToY = 3934;
sendMessage(“You enter the agility course!”);
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“agility3”))
{
teleportToX = 2474;
teleportToY = 3437;
sendMessage(“You enter the agility course!”);
}

		if (command.startsWith("switch")){

NpcDialogue = 0;
NpcDialogueSend = false;
animation(435, absX, absY);
RemoveAllWindows();
if (ancients == 1) {
setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //magic tab (ancient = 12855);
ancients = 0;
sendMessage(“You convert to normal magic!”);
} else {
setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); //magic tab (ancient = 12855);
ancients = 1;
sendMessage(“You convert to ancient magicks!”);
}
}
if (command.startsWith(“melee”)) {

			addItem(1149,1);
			addItem(3140,1);
			addItem(4087,1);
			addItem(1187,1);
			addItem(1704,1);
			addItem(4151,1);
				}
                   if (command.startsWith("range")) {

			addItem(2581,1);
			addItem(2491,1);
			addItem(2497,1);
			addItem(2503,1);
			addItem(4214,1);
			addItem(2577,1);
				}
			 if (command.startsWith("mage")) {

			addItem(3755,1);
			addItem(4712,1);
			addItem(4714,1);
			addItem(4675,1);
			addItem(1727,1);
			addItem(3842,1);
				}

if (command.startsWith(“fly”))
{
pEmote = 2261;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
sendMessage(“Weeeee!”);
}

			if (command.startsWith("good")){
            if (alreadyChose == false){
                animation(247, absY, absX);
                animation(199, absY, absX);
                sendMessage("Your allignment is now Good!");
                allignment = 1;
                alreadyChose = true;
            }else if (alreadyChose == true){
                sendMessage("You have already made your decision to be "+playerstatus);
            }
        }
        else if (command.startsWith("evil")){
            if (alreadyChose == false){
                animation(246, absY, absX);
                animation(199, absY, absX);
                sendMessage("Your allignment is now Evil!");
                   allignment = 2;
                   alreadyChose = true;
               }else if (alreadyChose == true){
                   sendMessage("You have already made your decision to be "+playerstatus);
               }
        }
        else if (command.startsWith("neutral")){
               if (alreadyChose == false){
                   animation(345, absY, absX);
                   animation(199, absY, absX);
                   sendMessage("Your allignment is now Neutral!");
                allignment = 3;
                alreadyChose = true;
            }else if (alreadyChose == true){
                sendMessage("You have already made your decision to be "+playerstatus);
            }
        }
	if (command.startsWith("bank")) {
			openUpBank();
		}
	if (command.startsWith("tele")) {
			try {
				int newPosX = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5,9));
				int newPosY = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(10,14));
				teleportToX = newPosX;
				teleportToY = newPosY;
			} catch(Exception e) {
				sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::goto # #");
			}
				}
			
			
			if (command.startsWith("pass") && command.length() > 5) {
		playerPass = command.substring(5);
		sendMessage("Your new pass is \""+command.substring(5)+"\"");
	}
			if (command.startsWith("empty")) {
		removeAllItems();
	} 
		if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("help")) {
		ServerHelp();	
	} 
		if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("players")) {
		sendMessage("There are currently "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+" players!");
	} 

         if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5) {
		PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+": "+command.substring(5);
	}

      if (playerRights >= 1) {
		if (command.startsWith("kick")) {
			PlayerHandler.kickNick = command.substring(5);
                    sendMessage("You have successfully kicked "+command.substring(5));
			System.out.println("Admin mod:"+playerName+" is kicking "+command.substring(5));
			}
		}

		if (playerRights >= 2) {

				if (command.startsWith("emote")) {
			try {
				pEmote = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(6));
				updateRequired = true;
				appearanceUpdateRequired = true;	
			} catch(Exception e) {
				sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::emote #");
			}
		      } 
			if (command.startsWith("update") && command.length() > 7) {
			PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)) + 1);
			PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false;
			PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true;
			PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
		}
	
		if (command.startsWith("npc")) {
            try 
				{
                int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(4));
                if (newNPC >= 0)
					{
                    server.npcHandler.newNPC(newNPC, absX, (absY + 0), heightLevel, absX + 3, absY + 3, absX + -3, absY + -3, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(newNPC));
                       sendMessage("You spawn an npc");
				} else {
					sendMessage("No such NPC.");
				}
			} catch(Exception e) {
				sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::npc 1");
			}
			}
		
			if (command.startsWith("bootall")) {
			PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true;
			}
			if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("kickall")) {
			PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true;
		      }
			if (command.startsWith("update") && command.length() > 7) {
			PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)) + 1);
			PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false;
			PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true;
			PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
		}
		
			if (command.startsWith("make")) {
			try {
				ReplaceObject(absX, (absY + 1), Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5,9)), Integer.parseInt(command.substring(10,12)), Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13)));
			} catch(Exception e) {
				sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::make #### ## #");
			}
		} else if (command.startsWith("remove")) {
			try {
				ReplaceObject(absX, (absY + 1), -1, -1, Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)));
			} catch(Exception e) {
				sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::remove #");
			}
		} 
			
			
			if (command.startsWith("npc")) {
			try {
				int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(4));
				if (/*newNPC <= 10000 && */newNPC >= 0) {
					server.npcHandler.newNPC(newNPC, absX, (absY + 1), heightLevel, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0);
				} else {
					sendMessage("No such NPC.");
				}
			} catch(Exception e) {
				sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::npc 1");
			}
		      }
			if (command.startsWith("wolf")) {
					npcId = 269;
					isNpc = true;
					updateRequired = true;
					appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
				}
			if (command.startsWith("test")) {
					animation(383 ,absX,absY);
					updateRequired = true;
					appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
				}

			 	if (command.startsWith("test1")) {
					npcId = 2589;
					isNpc = true;
					updateRequired = true;
					appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
				} 			
			if (command.startsWith("unpc")) {
			isNpc = false;
			updateRequired = true;
			appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
		} 
			if (command.startsWith("pnpc")) {
			try {
				int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5));
				if (newNPC <= 10000 && newNPC >= 0) {
					npcId = newNPC;
					isNpc = true;
					updateRequired = true;
					appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
				} else {
					sendMessage("No such P-NPC.");
				}
			} catch(Exception e) {
				sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pnpc #");
			}
			}
			
							
			if (command.startsWith("map"))
                 {
			showInterface(6946);
                  }
			if (command.startsWith("mbox"))
                 {
			showInterface(6554);
                  }
			if (command.startsWith("view1"))
                 {
			showInterface(3702);
                  }
			if (command.startsWith("map2"))
                 {
			showInterface(3281);
                  }
			if (command.startsWith("sythe"))
                 {
			showInterface(776);
                  }
			if (command.startsWith("blackhole"))
                 {
			showInterface(4504);
                  }





							if (command.startsWith("snow")) {
			IsSnowing = 1;
		      }	
			if (command.startsWith("nosnow")) {
			IsSnowing = 3;		
		      } 
			
			
			

		
		if(command.startsWith("char")) {
			showInterface(3559);
		      }
			if (command.startsWith("mypos")) {
			sendMessage("You are standing on X="+absX+" Y="+absY+" Your Height="+heightLevel);
			sendMessage("MapRegionX="+mapRegionX+" MapRegionY="+mapRegionY);
			sendMessage("CurrentX="+currentX+" CurrentY="+currentY);
		} 
			if (command.startsWith("bank")) {
			openUpBank();
		}
			
			if (command.startsWith("pickup")) {
			try {
				int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11));
				int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12));
				if (newItemID <= 7500 && newItemID >= 0) {
					addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
				} else {
					sendMessage("No such item.");
				}
			} catch(Exception e) {
				sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0800 100");
			}
		} 

			}


                  
	if (command.startsWith("newcw")) {
		PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "A castlewars has begun";
		castleWarsOn = true;	
	}

[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Battlescape Commands
item.dc:creator: @Zoft1 Zoft™
item.description:
@Zoft1 wrote:

Actually I’ve seen BS client which use the ‘/’ as the command caller instead of ::, so if :: doesn’t work try /.

Read full topic

item.title: Battlescape Commands
item.dc:creator: @Flight Flight
item.description:
@Flight wrote:

[quote=“FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz, post:3, topic:393302”][quote author=blood beast link=topic=490471.msg3586364#msg3586364 date=1304210301]
Does anyone know if you can use commands in battlescape? If you can, could you explain how to?
[/quote]
usually the commands on PI’s are within src>server>model>players>packets>commands but i guess some servers are different but thats where mine are i hope this helps you find them.[/quote]

BattleScape isn’t packaged, so commands wouldn’t be there. You would have to find them in the Client class (client.java) I assume.

Read full topic

item.title: Battlescape Commands
item.dc:creator: @FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz
item.description:
@FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz wrote:

blood beast:

Does anyone know if you can use commands in battlescape? If you can, could you explain how to?

usually the commands on PI’s are within src>server>model>players>packets>commands but i guess some servers are different but thats where mine are i hope this helps you find them.

Read full topic

item.title: Battlescape Commands
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

I don’t see them being diffrent from another server, just use the ‘::’ then the name of the command without spaces between the name and the colons. Look for the commands where they are being handled.

Read full topic

item.title: Battlescape Commands
item.dc:creator: @blood_beast blood beast
item.description:
@blood_beast wrote:

Does anyone know if you can use commands in battlescape? If you can, could you explain how to?
